name: Bionic Blitz!
description:
welcome to...

Bionic Blitz!.

Controls
 ✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ♥♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ♥-♥-✦-♥

Use WASD to move the playe
Press the space key to shoot your laser gun
Stop moving to reload 
Press R to generate the map again if you're stuck
 ✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ♥♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ♥-♥-✦-♥
 Objective

✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥-✦-♥ ✦-✦-♥-✦-♥ ✦-✦-♥-✦-♥ ✦-✦-♥-✦-♥
Avoid robots & shoot them with your laser. ✦ The purple bar indicates your laser battery. ✦ Once the battery on your laser runs out, reload. ✦ Once you've defeated all the robots, a new wave of enemies will spawn ✦-♥
